creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: irregular, rounded mountains; small pavilion at center; small waterfall at R; two groups of huts in middle ground at base of mountains; two figures fishing in boat at LR; figure crossing a bridge LRC; figure raking small piece of land near hut LLC
inscription:
URQ: 日高门尚掩？暖雨初晴扬尘？花；前罗池喜竹生读书？兰省事；？？？性本憐物？
驯鸟雀鸣；甲寅暮冬寫作於高松客舎并題製
markings: UR of the inscrpition: 天心{Tenshin}; LL of the inscrpition:福田世耕; 字曰子徳  {Azana nichi shitoku};
signed: URQ: 南海一布衣古道人
title: Mount Hidaka
